General.Name: AL JOUF CEMENT COMPANY
General.Description: Al Jouf Cement Company engages in production and sale of cement in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers ordinary Portland, sulphate resistant cement, white, agglomerated, and pozzolana Portland cement. The company also engages in import, export, wholesale, and retail trade of cement products. Al Jouf Cement Company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Alhayat Plaza, Office#204, Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, 3848
